actions.committee: Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1966 and the Motor Vehicle Information and Cost Savings Act to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 1979.
short_title: National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety and Motor Vehicle Information and Cost Savings Authorizations

summary.text: National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety and Motor Vehicle Information and Cost Savings Authorizations - Title I: Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety - Amends the National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1966 to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 1979 in such amounts as may be necessary to carry out the provisions of such Act. Title II: Motor Vehicle Information and Cost Savings - Amends the Motor Vehicle Information and Cost Savings Act to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 1979 in such amounts as may be necessary to carry out the provisions of such Act.

titles.title: National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety and Motor Vehicle Information and Cost Savings Authorizations
A bill to amend the National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1966 and the Motor Vehicle Information and Cost Savings Act to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 1979.
